title: Emerald & Diamond Nakshi Work Haaram - The 'Manohari'
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) resembling Diamonds. Hyderabadi Kundan Setting Technique.
features: Elaborate Nakshi work detailing showcasing traditional South Indian floral and paisley motifs. Features a central pendant with a peacock motif (Mayura) encrusted with CZs and a striking Emerald drop. The chain is designed with alternating Emerald and CZ clusters, leading up to the main pendant. The Kundan setting is meticulously done, showcasing the brilliance of each stone. Features layers of CZ to give the look of many flowers.
description: This exquisite Haaram is a testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry tradition. The intricate Nakshi work, combined with the brilliance of Emeralds and CZs, creates a truly captivating piece. The long design (Haaram) is perfect for a bride or for making a grand statement. The 'Manohari' represents beauty, prosperity, and timeless elegance. Offers a luxurious look at a more accessible price point thanks to the high-quality CZ simulating diamonds.
